thread.title: Pro Performance Mentor - Sports Management

title: Pro Performance Mentor - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Pro Performance Mentor Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: As a Mentor, you will be given the tools, training and support to help aspiring athletes get more out of their training and work towards their goals more effectively.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
